Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.rest

package us.ullberg.startpunkt.rest
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationResource
    REST API resource class for managing applications.
    BookmarkResource
    REST API resource class for managing bookmarks.
    ConfigResource
    REST API resource class for application configuration.
    I8nResource
    REST API resource class for managing language translations.
    Theme
    Represents the theme configuration for the application, including separate color schemes for light and dark modes.
    ThemeColors
    Represents the color scheme for a theme.
    ThemeResource
    REST resource providing theme configuration for the application.
